text: The little girl found in Venice (also known as La Bambina in culla che gioca con una farfalla) is a 19th-century oil painting by Antonio Rotta, in 1860, in Venice, Italy, exhibited at the Museo Bottacin in Padova, Italy.Bambina in culla con farfalla, Antonio Rotta, Fondo Bottacin == Related pages == * Genre painting * The Hopeless Case (Rotta) * The Retarded Child (Antonio Rotta) == Bibliographie == * La pittura nel Veneto: L'Ottocento, vol. 2, p. 887, 2003. == Notes == == Other websites == * Museum Bottacin * Le musée sur le site de la municipalité de Padoue Category:Paintings by Antonio Rotta Category:1860s paintings
title: The little girl playing with a butterfly (Rotta)
